bibl.title: Alexander the false Prophet and his God Asclepius - Glycon. Remarks Concerning the Representation of Asclepius with an Egg ('Type Nea Paphos - Alexandria - Trier').
bibl.note: Examine les représentations d'Asclépios provenant d'Égypte.

bibl.title: Cyprus and the East Mediterranean in the Iron Age. Proceedings of the Seventh British Museum Classical Colloquium, April 1988

bibl.seg: Grimm Günter, Alexander the false Prophet and his God Asclepius - Glycon. Remarks Concerning the Representation of Asclepius with an Egg ('Type Nea Paphos - Alexandria - Trier').
Veronica Tatton-Brown (Ed.), Cyprus and the East Mediterranean in the Iron Age. Proceedings of the Seventh British Museum Classical Colloquium, April 1988 (London, 1989) pp. 168-181, 10 figg.
Examine les représentations d'Asclépios provenant d'Égypte.
